channel.title: Scope Rules on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Scope Rules on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Promises, their environments, and how we evaluate them
item.description: Have you ever wondered how functions are evaluated? How you can have arguments that would raise errors, but do not, or how default arguments can be expressions that depend on function arguments that you haven’t seen yet when you define a function?
